If he was legit he wouldn't have put an password protection. IT'S NOT CRIMINAL TO UPLOAD, IT'S AGAINST COPYWRITE TO DOWNLOAD! IT IS THE SITES RESPONSIBILITY TO REMOVE COPYWRITED MATERIAL, SO UR FULL OF IT.
